QuestData.Title: Favor Amongst the Brotherhood, Lava Core
QuestData.CompletionText: The Thorium Brotherhood sympathizes with your plight, $r. This is why Lokthos has been empowered to bargain.$B$BOffer 1 Lava Core and you shall be granted favor amongst the Brotherhood.
QuestData.RewardText: Your offering has been accepted. Favor you have gained. Continue and you shall be allowed access to the ancient trades.
